description: **All, we are aware of the blank screen issue.  Please contact support and let us know what you were doing when the screen went blank; we have not been able to reproduce the issue but really want to fix it!  Your data isn't gone, we can tell you how to make it reappear as well. ** FillUps is a robust fuel tracking program.  It's clean interface will not get in the way of you getting your data entered.  You can sync your data to a Google docs account, making it easy to import data from other fuel tracking programs.  If you enable graph mode, you can rotate your WebOS device to the left and see a graph of your fillups! This application also takes advantage of localization; your correct currency will be displayed throughout the app!
